JOURNAL OF GEOPHYSICAL RESEARCH, VOL. 103, NO. D10, PAGES 11,505-11,528, MAY 27, 1998
Matrix parameterization of the 15 pm CO: band
cooling in the middle and upper atmosphere for
variable CO: concentration
V.I. Fomichev 1'2 and J.-P. B!anchet
Earth SciencesDepartment, Universit6 du Qu6bec k Montrdal, Montrdal, Canada
D. S. Turner
MeteorologicalResearchBranch,AtmosphericEnvironment Service,Toronto, Canada
